description: Lexical is an extensible text editor library that provides excellent reliability, accessible and performance.

scripts.test-e2e-plain:chromium: cross-env E2E_BROWSER=chromium cross-env E2E_EDITOR_MODE=plain-text jest --selectProjects e2e --collectCoverage=false --testPathPattern
scripts.test-e2e-plain:firefox: cross-env E2E_BROWSER=firefox cross-env E2E_EDITOR_MODE=plain-text jest --selectProjects e2e --collectCoverage=false --testPathPattern
scripts.test-e2e-plain:webkit: cross-env E2E_BROWSER=webkit cross-env E2E_EDITOR_MODE=plain-text jest --selectProjects e2e --collectCoverage=false --testPathPattern
scripts.test-e2e-collab:chromium: cross-env E2E_BROWSER=chromium cross-env E2E_EDITOR_MODE=rich-text-with-collab jest --selectProjects e2e --collectCoverage=false --testPathPattern

scripts.prepare-ci: npm run build --prefix packages/lexical-playground && serve packages/lexical-playground/build -l 4000
scripts.prepare-ci-collab: npm run build --prefix packages/lexical-playground && concurrently "npm run collab" "serve packages/lexical-playground/build -l 4000"
